author: Francesco Giubilei
title: The EU’s Betrayal of Italy May Be Its Undoing
description: When countries are turning to China because their supranational institutions won't help, that's a problem. The post The EU’s Betrayal of Italy May Be Its Undoing appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: When countries are turning to China because their supranational institutions won't help, that's a problem.The COVID-19 pandemic has taken a greater toll on Italy than any other nation. The Italians are facing their most severe crisis since the Second World Wa… [+9428 chars]
